template.description: This prompt is designed to help identify gaps in the literature or research.

fields.research_topic: Please specify the research topic you are interested in.
fields.existing_research: What existing research or literature do you want to reference?
fields.desired_outcome: What specific gaps or questions do you want to explore?

example.existing_research: Recent studies on AI applications in diagnostics.
example.desired_outcome: Identify areas where AI has not yet been applied.
